item.title: 8051 basic usage using EdSim51
item.description: EdSim51 This section starts with directly working on EdSim51, and this means this section will do operation with assembly. What is EdSim51 ? Basically it simulates a complete embedded system, including LCD, LEDs, keypads, serial. edsim screentshot How to program it ? directly on bare metal –> assembly :(( Well, its quite low-level, for that you need to manage all the registers, memory, control flow by yourself by writing assembly, which is really hard to read.
